description.text:
[url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ][img]https://img.shields.io/badge/Discord-7289da?logo=discord&logoColor=fff&style=flat-square[/img][/url][url=https://ko-fi.com/jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Support-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=kofi&color=222222[/img][/url] [url=https://www.twitch.tv/Jodsderechte][img]https://custom-icon-badges.demolab.com/badge/-Catch%20me%20Live-lightgrey?style=flat-square&logo=Twitch&color=22283D[/img][/url]
Displays Odyns Runic affinity and which spot to go to. Also has text to speech alert to instantly get called out on where to go.


Get my Dungeon Auras over at [url=https://www.curseforge.com/wow/addons/dungeon-aura-tools]My Addon[/URL] alternativly you can import them seperatly at
[list]
[*][url=https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons]https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons]https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons [/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons]https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons]https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons]https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons[/url]
[*][url=https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons]https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons [/url]
[/list]
respectivly[/color][/b]



If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free.

Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my [url=https://discord.gg/v3gYmYamGJ]Discord[/url].

If you like my work and want to support me you can [url=https://www.paypal.com/donate/?hosted_button_id=PSQ4D3HXNZKMG]donate[/url]
description.html:
Displays Odyns Runic affinity and which spot to go to. Also has text to speech alert to instantly get called out on where to go. Get my Dungeon Auras over at My Addon alternativly you can import them seperatly at
  • https://wago.io/DF-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/SL-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/BFA-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/Legion-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/WOD-Dungeons
  • https://wago.io/MOP-Dungeons
respectivly If you like to change the Size of the Icons, please use the "Group Scale" option instead of changing width/height of all Auras at the same time because that may crash your game while Group-Scale is lag-free. Every feedback/help is greatly appreciated feel free to contact me by joining my Discord. If you like my work and want to support me you can donate

comments.text: [taggeduser]@Thepassion#2560[/taggeduser] i personally never needed to change anything for the text to speech settings. Supposedly it's " The extra options are in the chat settings of the chat window"

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] I already triple checked. What option you are refering to? Interestingly, they seem to have changed something there in todays maintenance or something. Few days ago i had seperate options for "Voice Chat". As of today, this option somehow vanished from the options. I can only choose an "Output Device". Days before there were Voice Chat and another one i dont remember. Basically three options where i could select a device from. Today only one is left.
[taggeduser]@Thepassion#2560[/taggeduser] Its not a wa issue double check what you have set your text to speech audio output to (it's a seperate setting in the blizzard settings)

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] ok i made a small WA with TTS and it's reproducible. It looks like a bug in WA somehow. The TTS sound is always played on the windows default speaker, no matter what is configured ingame. No matter what i tried... with my testing, when i change the windows default to my headset, which is not how i play usually, then it works. Guess i need to remember this when i play HOV for now and report it to WA devs...
[taggeduser]@Thepassion#2560[/taggeduser] use anything else using text to speech alternativly you can try it in m0 you can oneshit everything there so it should be very quick

[taggeduser]@Jodsderechte[/taggeduser] I checked all settings and have a strong assumtion, that this TTS is played due to "Voice Chat". Since i never used my voice chat ingame, its set to system default (which is my speaker). That would be the only halfway logical reason for that behavior. So my audio output device is set to my headset, my voice chat is on system default. I will try changing this setting and see how it goes. Any ideas/tipps how i can test this without running HOV?
[taggeduser]@Thepassion#2560[/taggeduser] that is very odd and technically can't even happen. You can change the sound channel though in Actions -> on show and see if that helps

I gave this one a try, but i am facing a pretty strange unique behavior on this one. For whatever reason, the text-to-speak part of this WA is on my systemspeaker, while my ingame sound is set to my headset. So you can imagine, that the whole house is waken up, when i engage the boss/runes :-D Everything is on my headset gamesound wise, just this TTS part here in system speaker. Any idea how to avoid this, it's really a showstopper here. Cannot use it like this :(
